title: UniCredit CEO Jean Pierre Mustier to Leave Bank in April
sub_head: Mustier’s decision to depart at the end of his mandate follows disagreements with the board over the lender’s strategy
body:
ROME—Italian bank UniCredit SpA said late Monday that Chief Executive Jean Pierre Mustier will leave the bank in April.
Mr. Mustier’s departure follows months in which disagreements with the board of the bank over the lender’s strategy had intensified.
“Over the last few months, it has become apparent that the Team 23 [the bank’s business...
